attributes.additional_details:
Telford and Wrekin council wish to demolish the woodcutter pub in Hollinswood to make way for new shops. Why remove something that isn't broke? The pub not only gives local residents a place to visit, work and live but its been a landmark to locals for many years and hopefully many more years to come.

Sign our petition today to help appeal against this decision made by the council, a resident from hollinswood had this to say;
